title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 401.5 - Revised district component
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 401.5 - Revised district component

State Regulations
(a) Following receipt and analysis of public
comment, the social services district shall prepare and submit to the
department, in a form and at a time specified by the department revised
district component for approval and incorporation by the department into the
final comprehensive annual social services program plan. (b) The submission shall include an
explanation of differences between the proposed and the revised district
component, the reasons therefor, and a summary of all public comment
received. (c) The department will
review the revised district component to assure that it is in conformity with
minimum Federal and State requirements. The department review will include
consideration of programmatic and fiscal feasibility in light of needs and
resources identified in the district component. The social services district
shall take immediate action in cooperation with the department to correct any
deficiencies in the revised district component identified by the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
401.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
